siddhartha hamuduruwo anna ee budu dahama thula kiyawena parama aththath me githaya thulata muhu karanawa, poya dawasaka thibunu wichara wadasatahanaka me kathawa ahune //ada numbaa kothanada nandunana pemwathun wela...//

hama podi ekama ooka rambaa yanna hapanawa.
rata thula mathuwena me ghoshawa idiriye janadhipathi sirisena nasu kanwa siti.
ema chanthana ee ee aagam  ha darshana yatathe ma upa shirsha  washayen hadarana wita  ෙbruddha samaja darshanaya ,  kristhiyani  samaja darshanaya  aadi washayen da handunwanu labe.
daruwantath apitath atha pirenna poth labuna.
namuth diyunu wena ratawala me thathwaya hathpasinma wenas.

ema kramawedaya yatathe ek redi mitarayakin rupiyal 50ka pamana ithiriyak pawathima saha deshiya nishpadakayingen redi labaganimen widesha winimaya da ithiri wima yana karunu salaka bala adhyapana ha usas adhyapana amathya wijayadasa rajapaksha mahatha wisin mema yojanawa idiripath kara thibe.
“siyallo mata sawan dethwa” mama anawaki kiyannekmi.
chethiya raju ki boruwala prathishathaya danaganimata kramayak natha.

kana matha,nahaya matha paharima ashubhaya.bella matha paharima roga pilibanda ingiyaki.hasthayehi paharima gnyathi hitha mithuranta ashubha bawa kiyawe.padayehi paharima sathuru biya sith thawul genade.kata thula paharima dhana labha gena de.kaputan kothanaka ho radi athi jalaya nanawa dutuwa hoth warshawakiganiwasa idiripita kaputu kudu thanimada,ashubha ya karadara,asamangiya, agahinga genade.thawada,kaputa paharima purusha pakshayata dakunu pasatada sthri pakshayata wam pasatada shubhase kaputu shasthye sandahanya.

dhana thanhawen mudal pasu passe yamin shasthi්raya mehewara athahara dama athi wathman aduran siri gunasinhayangen padam igena gathahoth eya pamanak wuwa owunge chaura jiwithayen midimata magak wanu nisaka ya.
emenma barak obamage palana samayedi athikaragath irana nyashtika wyapruthi giwisuma da ohuge wiwechanayata lakwuna.

anawashyanam nikam indiwi kiyala eya mata kiwwa."

ape rate minissu me awasana awasthawa nathikaragaththoth rata iwarayi..maha bankuwath winasa karala ape badu mudalin unta sapawindinna denna epa

eya aswalatath hithakarayi.
thawath pirisak kiyanawa duka thaman saha anun wisin karana lada deyak bawa.
meka waradak nemeyi.
oya thiyenne niyamama kathawa..

lankawe warthamana rajathanthrika hasirima elesaya.
mona mona katha kiwwath mathiwaranayata me aanduwa bayayi.
bengaliwala.mage amma indira bhaduri.piya taron kumar bhaduri,ohu lekhakayek ee wagema madhyawediyek.
ee wagema elesngi loketa handunwa dunna yayi salakena swis jathika alfa්rang hofmanta elesngi wala sayanika bhawithayan gana paryeshana karanna stiw jobs aadhara karanawa.
eeka parana pothak.
owun siyalu dena ma sinhala bauddha chinthanayata wiruddha wa  demala jathiwadaya nirmanaya kara eya surakamin poshanaya karanawa
sudothum piyathuma saha roma kyuriyawe radaguru himiwarunata dharmawiwekaya deshana karana piyathumageni.
pahuwenida hawaswenakota dangayage kana suddakorana kol enawa...
eheth eya kramaya wenas kirimata hethuwak nam nowe.
mage asuna ayata di..
shuddha wu paya

hondama upaharaya thamayi liyapu eewa kiyawima.
esema kawuduluwawa ayath wanneda ema kottasayatama ya.

eeta pradhanathama hethuwa wanne lamayin dumpanayata yomuwima walakwimatath, dumwati bhawitha karannan in muda ganimatath sigarat pakattuwa matha yodana rupamaya awawada wishala balapamak sidu karana bawini.
kese wethath ohu wisin athi kala sanwidanaya kerehi biyata pathwu batahira jathin samanya janathawa kerehi bhithikawak athi kirima sandaha ema kandayama wahab wadin lesa nam kota atha.
eeth deshapalanagnyayangen yapena madhyaya aayathanath thiyenawane.
ee gana pothak thiyenawa daiwagnya kamenuwa kiyala.
thamunnansege agamathikenek path karaganna api wipakshaye idala kondesi sahithawa sahaya dennam kiyala.
mama kamathima deshapalana nayakaya ethumayi.
kadaya sawikaraganna puluwan wiya.
ee kathawa thripitakaye natha.
nidangatha roga nisa athiwana wedanawa, aatharayitis, kenda peralima nisa athiwana wedanawa samanayata aadaraya kirima saha lingika sabandatha pawathwima upakari we.
eya wenath deshapalana aramunakin wana deyak.
dan thama amaruma kotasa.
as deka ma wasuwe da?
nawa wyawastha sammanthranaye galagottiyak..
me yugaye yudamaya anshayen rate pradhana senapathita dewanuwa daknata aththe adhikaraya.
ada samajaye ali athun gana sakachcha wena dewal padaka karagena thamayi me lipiya liwwe.
me salli walata kade yana ekek.
dan mama pare yana wita minissu nithara amuthu widihata katha karanawa.

ese nowenam shri lanka nidahas pakshaye aanduwak pihituwimata kapawiya yuthu bawath,thawaduratath eksath jathika pakshaya samaga sitimen pakshikayange kalakirimata lakwimata siduwanu athi bawath penwadi athi manthriwaraya aanduwe aththe shri lanka nidahas pakshaye prathipaththi nowana nisa shrilanipa ananyathawa rakaganimin parlimenthuwe swadhinawa sitima sandaha amathiwarun kandayamak thiranaya kara athayi sandahan kara atha.
eya danduwamata wenas ekaki.
ese thibiyadi kisima wirodhathawayak nomathiwa obawa ape karagath eksath jathika pakshikayinge hith ridawima me mohothe nokiyama bariya.
mokada meka liyala linkuwa mama aniwa defa okige munu pothe paniwida pettiyata assata yawanawamayi....ne..
pahadiliwama wiwidha basratha sewa sandaha pawathiya yuthu kondesi sandahan kala yuthuya.
rajawarunta kamathi aya inna thak kal ithin rajawaru nathiwenne naha.
pu. 1280 tharam atha kalayakadi bihi wu purana giwisuma nawa nithi paddhathin sandaha thawamath adala wana paranithama nithiya wiya hakiya.
dan koheda indan inna babbu.
pawana muktha aasana malawa pilibanda saha ehi yedena aakaraya labana sathiye wimasa balamu.
paksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha samaga ee pilibadawa sakachcha pawathwa awasan.
jathika bara isilime tharagawaliya pasugiyada krida amath...

“ow wenna puluwan.
me rahasa danne owun dedena pamani.
nangi ammawa bala ganna gedara nathara wuna.
lankawe sinhala bauddha padanama, buddha shasanaya bakal kirima kristhiyani muladharmawadi wyaparaye ilakkayaki.
tika dawasakata thayilanthayata gihin aawa.
rathu hamudawa sanwidhanaya 1983 juli 13wanida thalawathugodadi hamuwu athara ehidi ratapura siya wagakim kriyakarinta pawarana ladi.
ee ekkama anith dewalwalath mila adu karanna oona…’

paryeshana daththa walata anuwa awiwahaka pirimin anawashya lesa hiru eliyata lakwima, sama gana unanduwak nathiwima meyata hethuwayi. 4 adhika dumpanaya saha ee ha sambandha laya pilika, swasana paddhathiya awahira wime rogaya saha aduma athiwime dima awadhanaya aththe wayasa awurudu 40ta wadi awiwahaka pirimintayi. 5 saukyamath nowana aahara ratawanta huru wima nisa bara wadiwima, diyawadiyawa saha hardayabadha bahula awurudu 40ta wadi awiwahaka piriminta saha dikkasada wuwantayi 6.

ehidi, mathakadi hindu pujakayeku mulikawa ata hawiridi dariyaka samuha dushanayata lakkara maradamime siddhiya menma, bharathiya janatha paksha deshapalagnyayan kihipa deneku dushakayan wenuwen peni sitimath, ema pakshayema deshapalagnyayeku wisin 16 hawiridi tharuniyaka dushanaya kirime siddhiyath mema katunaya nirmanayata wasthu bija sapaya athi bawada sandahan weyi.
thaththa indiya ragadhari sangithayath, jana sangithayath aabhasayen nirmana kale.
melo rahak nam na.
mama hithanne eya tamil kenek..
nathnam amaruwe watenna wenne mata neweyi oyata."
ugannana welawedith oluwa karakila oyage gawata as deka enakota echchara wela mage diha balagena idala idala oya bima balaganne.!!!!!!!
eeth samahara welawata marama prashna.
me chodanawa sapura deshapalana paliganimak.
wasikili wala dorawal walata oto klosar hayi karala thiyenne.
man kolla kale yaluwoth ekka me handiyen payin oona tharam gihin thiyenawa.
ithin koheda mahaththayo thawa kathawak.
ema aramuna sarthaka wu bawa ohu prakasha kaleya.
me gatalu athi wenne dum bona ayata witharada?
ena kochchiye hitiya gothaya gana ripot kalamawath mokek wath aawe naha.
ee bhikshun wahanse bauddha darshanaya, sanskruthiya, sabhyathwaya, jathiya, bhashawa aaraksha karannata buddhimathwa kapawimen kriya kala.
kollo ekka natanna yanawa kiyala.
ohu dina hathak ee wenuwen pewi sitimada wadagath weyi.
pawaraganimakata wadi deyak no we
mama hitiye kamaraya athule.
nishantha mekedi hondama de (katunayakadi) issaralama bag eka aran udata gihin diyuti fri yanna.

eeth eya thula gabwa athi athishayokthiyayi ma wiwechanaya kale.ratak jathiyak aagamak kiyanne minissu hadagaththa sankalpamaya dewal witharayi.mulika wigrahayedi api eka widihata husmaganna ekama ratawakata jana sanyuthiyak thiyena ekama wisheshayaka jiwin pirisak witharayi.api aniwaryayen ape sanskruthika watinakam walata garu karanna oona ewa agayanna ona eth ewata oonawata wada wahal unoth apitama ewa barak wenawa.hariyata mage komentuwata obata tharaha giya wage.oba sankalpa walandaganna tharamata sankalpa wisin obawa gila gannawa.gal yugaye idala minissu wena wena kandayam widihata durin durin thamayi jiwath une eka nisa wena wena sanskruthin athi una minissu ekata jiwath unoth sanskruthin ekata muhu wela nawa sanskruthiyak athi wenawa.rawana kiyanne wishwiya minisek ee maha minisa jathiwadi ramuwakata kotu karana eka bodubala senawata budu hamuduruwange sinnakkara ayithiya dunna wage wadak.mita wada pululwa hithanna sahodaraya.ma oba thulinma eya mathukara pen wuwa.me nil ahasa yata me maha polawa matha mama thawath ekama eka homo sepiyan sepiyan kenek witharayi.
suriya wawa gowiyan pawasanne jalaya akkara adi 70,000 k thibiyadi da mita pera thaman waga katayuthu sarthakawa sidukala bawayi.
ayiwan, wiktar. 1990, shri lankawe nuthana karalikaruwange samaja pasubima
manda ese purwa piya athharinnata tharame kasherukawak dhanawadayata nomathi bawini; etharamata ma dhanawadaya pithru mulika nowana bawini.
welenda wyaparawala yedi sitina ayata sarthaka prathipala apeksha kala haka.
ohu mata nagitinnata udaw kala athara mage awadhanaya dakunathe wu mal kalambaa wetha yomu wiya.
mata awidinna thibune mitara 100 tath wada adu durak...
iwasima kiyana de punchi kale indalama mage puruddak bawata pathwela thibuna.
( kiwwata tharaha ganta kari na.mama dakinne ehema)ada api dakina naluwo wihilu karanne mulu agama hollagenane.
“obata hamadema hamadama karanna ba” kiyana padamath mawak wimen pasuwa mama igenagaththa”.
“radhaya, yam ee marayek weda?
eya ohuge thun aanduthu nawakatha wana bagandara, withanda samaya ha aadaraye simenthi wani nawakatha samaga eka pelata thabiya haki nawakathawak nowe.
ada bukiya paluyi...

parisara amathyanshaya, prawahana amathyanshaya, karmantha amathyanshaya, widya ha thakshana amathyanshaya, balashakthi amathyanshaya, lanka khanija thel sansthawa, lanka widulibala mandalaya, motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwa, wyawasaya sanwardhana mandalaya, kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa, wishwawidyalawala wisheshagnyayinge ha aayathana pradhaningen mema wyapruthiye kamitu sanyuthiya sakasila thibenawa ehi sabhapathithwaya ha mulikathwaya daranne madhyama parisara adhikariyayi.merata wayu sampath kalamanakaranaya sandaha prathipaththi regulasi ha pramithi sampadanaya, saukhya ha parisarika haniya thakseru kirima, wayu dushkaraka prabhawayanta sambandha daththa lekhana gatha kirima wani kriyamarga menma wayu dushanaya sambandhayen janathawa danuwath kirima wani kriyamarga sandaha madhyama parisara adhikariya madihathwi katayuthuª karanawa.wayu dushanaye mulashra washayen salakiya hakke rathawahana, balagara saha karmantha shala magin pitawana kaban monoksayid, salfar dayoksayid, nayitrajan oksayid dushaka anshun ha hayidro kaban wani ahithakara wayu menma lokaye adhika lesa sampath, bhanda ha sewa paribhojakayan adhika wayu dushakayan widiyata salakanna puluwan.
ow apita ee gana podi prashnayak thiyenawa.
pahara dun ayata anuwa me siyalu pahara dim karala thiyenne hethuwak athiwa.
